name: LuisBank - Data Overview
description: Dashboard base para KPIs do LuisBank

cards.title: KPIs Diarios
cards.query: select * from fact_daily_kpis order by tx_date desc

cards.title: Ticket Medio por Operacao
cards.query: select operation_type, avg(amount) as avg_amount from fact_transactions group by operation_type

cards.title: Top Clientes por Saldo
cards.query: select user_id, sum(balance) as total_balance from dim_account group by user_id order by total_balance desc limit 10

cards.title: Distribuicao de Segmentos
cards.query: select segment, count(*) as total from customer_segments group by segment

cards.title: Checks de Qualidade
cards.query: select * from dw.dq_checks order by run_at desc limit 20

cards.title: Eventos CDC
cards.query: select * from dw.cdc_events order by captured_at desc limit 20
